text:
The walk-forward validation approach to evaluating predictive models on this dataset is
provided below, named evaluate model(). The train and test datasets in standard-week format
are provided to the function as arguments. An additional argument, n input, is provided that
is used to deÔ¨Åne the number of prior observations that the model will use as input in order to
make a prediction. Two new functions are called: one to build a model from the training data
